00024 bool uvm_component::kill() {
00025 #if (SYSTEMC_VERSION >= 20120701)
00026   if (m_run_handle.valid() && !m_run_handle.terminated()) {
00027     m_run_handle.kill();
00028   }
00029   return true;
00030 #else
00031   return false;
00032 #endif
00033 }
00034 
00035 bool uvm_component::reset() {
00036 #if (SYSTEMC_VERSION >= 20120701)
00037   if (m_run_handle.valid() && !m_run_handle.terminated()) {
00038     m_run_handle.reset(SC_INCLUDE_DESCENDANTS);
00039   }
00040   return true;
00041 #else 
00042   return false;
00043 #endif
00044 }

00112 template <typename T>
00113 bool uvm_component::throw_it(T& t) {
00114 #if (SYSTEMC_VERSION >= 20120701)
00115   if (m_run_handle.valid() && !m_run_handle.terminated()) {
00116     m_run_handle.throw_it(t, SC_INCLUDE_DESCENDANTS);
00117   }
00118   return true;
00119 #else 
00120   return false;
00121 #endif
